settings.message_text:
Official Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry Online Store
Powered and Fulfilled By Renaissance Global
settings.heading: Get in touch
settings.sub-heading: We would love to hear from you and answer any questions you may have.
settings.sub-heading1: You may complete the following form to let us know how we can help.

settings.title: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away….
settings.paragraph: Introducing the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry collection,  inspired by classic Star Wars films. Also featuring a bonus capsule collection inspired by The Mandalorian™. The unique and exclusive assortment offers a variety of covetable fashion and bridal pieces, designed to embody the most iconic figures in the galaxy. Explore the finest diamond and gemstone collection each piece carefully crafted with exquisite detail.  Experience all Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry has to offer.  May the Force be with you.

settings.title: Dark Side
settings.paragraph: Let the dark side dominate your destiny with the sleek and edgy combination of metals, diamonds, and gemstones carefully designed to exemplify the power of the darkness. Each piece fashioned with bold details to command an Empire.
settings.ls_paragraph: Be consumed by the power and limitless possibilities of the Light Side. Let the light ignite your allegiance with the exquisite combination of metals, diamonds and gemstones. Each piece crafted with the delicate details of the iconic figures of the Alliance.

settings.title: The Star Wars Experience!
settings.paragraph: Unveil your Star Wars™ adventure begins with the exquisite packaging created to withstand the hyperspace travel. The unique and illuminating package features outstanding galactic details designed exclusively for the Star Wars™ FineJewelry Collection.

settings.content: You don't know the power of the dark side!

settings.title: Excellence in Craftsmanship
settings.paragraph: Designed with unique and exquisite details in every piece, carefully crafted to bring the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry experience to life. The finest of designers with years of skilled training & precision to details, makes our craftsmanship excel in every aspect.

settings.filter_tags: The Mandalorian, Into the Galaxy, Balance of Nature, Balance of the Force, Celestial Love, Forces of the Galaxy, Friendship

settings.empty_collection_text:
The item you’re searching for is unavailable.
We are adding more jewelry items to the collections!

settings.authenticity_content:
Licensed Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry collection

Each piece is inspired by the iconic themes and imagery within the Star Wars galaxy and is handcrafted with high quality materials, impeccable workmanship and attention to detail. The exact metal content and Lucasfilm legal line are engraved on every piece.
settings.shipping_content:
FAST SHIPPING & DELIVERY

Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry collection customers get fast & reliable shipping on all orders. Free Express Shipping for all orders.

FREE RETURNS

All orders which have been purchased on StarWarsFineJewelry.com, may be returned for free to the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry collection Online Shop Distribution center using our pre-paid label and return form. Learn more about our return policy here.

We kindly remind you that if for any reason you are not satisfied with the products purchased on our website, you may request a free return within 30 days from delivery of the items. After 30 days, all sales are final. All returns must be received unaltered, unworn, and in the original condition with its original packaging. Any returns without its original packaging in mint condition will result in a $50 charge. Custom and engraved items are considered final sale and non-refundable. All refunds will be issued in the original form of payment within 14 days from the date the return is received. Merchandise credits will be issued through our system within 3 days from the date the return is received. Please contact our staff at StarWarsFineJewelry@renaissanceglobal.com or (947) 218 7827.

settings.title: Excellence in Craftsmanship
settings.paragraph: Designed with unique and exquisite details in every piece, carefully crafted to bring the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry experience to life. The finest of designers with years of skilled training & precision to details, makes our craftsmanship excel in every aspect.

The "Balance of the Force" collection. The bold and strong enforcer meets the Young Jedi. Consumed by the Dark Side, Lord Vader’s dark armor protects his true identity. Pushed to the edge of darkness the young Jedi must balance of the force within him. A timeless battle where fate meets destiny. The dark and sleek "Balance of the Force" collection symbolizes the fate of a Jedi Knight when consumed by the dark side. The forces of good and evil are strong enough to seduce anyone into the dark side. Never underestimate the power of the dark forces.

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by Darth Vader™, the enforcer of the Galactic Empire.
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by the resiliency of Luke Skywalker™

settings.heading: In a galaxy far far away..

settings.section_subtitle: Embark on your Star Wars™ journey with the fine jewelry collection, designed to ignite your inner dark side or illuminate the light within.

settings.paragraph: The “Celestial Love” collection generates a strength in commitment and a bond of love that can withstand the struggles of a galaxy in turmoil. Inspired by the courageous leadership of Princess Leia™ paired with the scoundrel heroism of Han Solo™, this special connection is a display of resilience and affection for a greater good. This collection is as charming, spirited and daring as the icons it epitomizes.

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by Han Solo™, the rogue smuggler and daring captain.
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by Princess Leia Organa™, the fearless royal Rebel and the irresistible bond of love.

settings.paragraph: Awaken an energy around us with the “Balance of Nature” collection inspired by the mystical planet of Dagobah™ and the lessons of Jedi Master Yoda™.  Knowledge shared between teacher and student reveals that strength flows not only from within, but also from without.  Through this collection, discover the balance of nature that grounds our surroundings and affirms the importance of our purpose in a grander environment.

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by Jedi Master Yoda™, and the balance of nature.
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by Luke Skywalker’s™ strength and the journey of self-discovery.

settings.paragraph: The “Forces of the Galaxy” collection represents bravery and devotion to a greater cause when looked at from opposing sides. Collection details denote the mighty strength of legendary Wookiee™ warrior Chewbacca™ juxtaposed with the feared Stormtrooper forces of the Galactic Empire – both ready to defend what matters most in the galaxy. Inspired by courage and allegiance, join the forces of your galaxy with these resilient symbols of loyalty.

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by the Chewbacca™ the brave and mighty Wookiee loyal to the Rebel Alliance.
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by the Imperial Stormtroopers, the loyal and feared forces of the Empire.

settings.paragraph: The Star Wars galaxy is as vast as it is varied, where personal choices spark profound influence. The “Into the Galaxy” collection with stellar highlights signifies an expansive tapestry of adventures and the symbol of Jedi protection to inspire limitless possibilities across the galaxy.

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by the speed of light in the galaxy and the movement of glimmering starfields.
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by the Jedi Knights™, the guardians of peace and justice in the galaxy.

settings.paragraph: A classic bond of friendship, the loyal R2-D2™ and meticulous C-3PO™ are enduring companions involved in some of the galaxy’s most defining moments and thrilling battles. The “Friendship” collection is designed with droid-distinct details and iconic color cues. Join your friends and strengthen your alliance with the "Friendship" collection.

settings.ds_paragraph: Inspired by R2-D2™ the devoted yet lighthearted Droid
settings.ls_paragraph: Inspired by C-3PO™ the spirited and intelligent protocol droid, loyal to Luke Skywalker ™ and lifelong companion to R2-D2™.

settings.title: Star Wars™ fine jewelry
settings.subtitle: About us
settings.paragraph:
Welcome to StarWarsFineJewelry.com, manufactured and fulfilled by Renaissance Global.

Renaissance Jewelry is part of Renaissance Global, a highly differentiated luxury lifestyle products company that designs, manufactures and sells fine jewelry to global retailers.

Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry is a collection inspired by classic Star Wars films and also features a bonus capsule collection inspired by The Mandalorian™. The unique and exclusive assortment offers a variety of covetable fashion and bridal pieces, designed to embody the most iconic figures in the galaxy. Explore the finest diamond and gemstone collection, each piece carefully crafted with exquisite detail.  Experience all Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry has to offer.  May the Force be with you.

settings.title: JEWELRY CARE & ENHANCEMENT
settings.paragraph: Since 1857, Enchanted Disney Fine Jewelry has maintained the highest standards in design, materials and craftsmanship, creating jewelry that has been passed down for generations. With proper care, you can preserve the beauty of your Enchanted jewelry for years to come.

settings.title: Jewelry Cleaning & Repair
settings.paragraph: Bring your Enchanted jewelry in for professional servicing to protect its beauty for years. From ring resizing and necklace repair to loose stones, our experts are knowledgeable and experienced in all aspects of jewelry care.
Embark on this new journey with the lone gunfighter and the mysterious child. Designed to highlight The Mandalorian’s distinct armor and the details of The Child.

settings.newsletter_form_heading: Be the first to know when we launch.

settings.title: The next chapter in the story of his & hers
settings.text: More than one story means more than one ring..

From rose gold and black rhodium, to blue sapphires and black diamonds, Find the Star Wars™ Fine Jewelry styles you need for your next chapter this Valentine’s Day with our ‘His and Hers’ diamond rings.

settings.title: His & hers - Celestial Love
settings.text: Say I DO with rings inspired by a celestial love that can withstand the greatest of odds. The Princess Leia™ wedding band features a delicate rose gold quilt design accented with white diamonds and the Han Solo™ wedding band features a black rhodium quilt design accented with black diamonds. These rings are destined to be paired with each other.

settings.title: His & hers - Celestial Love
settings.text: Say I DO with rings inspired by a celestial love that can withstand the greatest of odds. The Princess Leia™ wedding band features a delicate rose gold diamond design accented with white diamonds and destined to be paired with the Han Solo™ wedding band. The Han Solo™ wedding band features a black rhodium diamond design accented with black diamonds and destined to be paired with the Princess Leia™ wedding band.

settings.title: His & hers - R2-D2TM
settings.text: Join the rebellion and say I DO with this timeless R2-D2™ wedding band. Inspired by this loyal and lighthearted droid, a combination of white diamonds, and genuine blue sapphires are thoughtfully placed for a sophisticated look that will last forever.

settings.title: His & hers - C-3PoTM
settings.text: Show your commitment and say I DO with this C-3PO™ wedding band. This fine yellow gold band is designed to mirror the details of Threepio’s frame and mechanical build with white diamonds for a touch of elegance.

settings.title: His & hers - The mandalorian
settings.text: Follow the way of The Mandalorian with rings made in high polish silver, complimented with a matt black rhodium T shape in resemblance of The Mandalorian’s helmet. Define your solid relationship with designs that mirror the shape of the armor of the human warrior clan.

settings.title: His & hers - Stormtrooper™
settings.text: Inspired by the Stormtrooper™. Join the loyal and feared forces of the Empire with this glossy black and white, his and hers ring. The sleek design accented with black diamonds is carefully crafted to mirror the stormtroopers protective armor.

settings.title: His & hers - Dark Armor
settings.text: The circle is now complete with these rings inspired by Darth Vader™, the enforcer of the Galactic Empire. Allow yourself to be seduced by the dark side, with the sleek black diamond framed rings. Designed to evoke Lord Vader’s powerful armor.

settings.title: His & hers - Dark Armor
settings.text: The circle is now complete with this ring inspired by Darth Vader™, the enforcer of the Galactic Empire. Say I do to the dark side and together you can rule the galaxy with this sleek black rhodium and diamond wedding bands.
